proposal: Understanding the essence of scaling and enhancing decentralized economies, Fuel's vision of a rollup OS for Ethereum is a game-changer. Congrats on reaching 58 holders on the ETH network! 🚀 If you're looking to further engage your community, consider our DEX and Lottery tools. They're not just revenue-sharing mechanisms but a way for anyone in the community to contribute and thrive. Let's roll(up) together!
